page.title: 10LEISURE
page.content: There are many ways in which people in our area spend their leisure time.These include recreation sites in each village with play areas for young children.Local works eg. Air Products supplement the public parks with similar amenities.Plas Madoc Leisure Centre was opened 1974,situated in a council housing estate.It provides many amenities for indoor sports for the Llangolled-Wrexham area.The main hall can be used for games,discos,dances and plays.The family bathing pool have a wave making machine.There are 4 squash courts and a restaurant and bar.Most villages have a hall and activities eg. bingo are held.Local public houses have darts and domino teams.Other popular pastimes are walking,cycling and fishing.
